braveRewards.description: Title in welcome screen for the panel

welcomeButtonTextOne.description: CTA on welcome screen in the panel, existing users

welcomeButtonTextTwo.description: CTA on welcome screen in the panel, new users

welcomeDescOne.message: 透過檢視廣告來賺取代幣並將它們付給您喜愛的內容創作者。
welcomeDescOne.description: Entry text for welcome screen in the panel, existing user

welcomeDescTwo.message: 您現在可以透過觀看尊重隱私的廣告來賺取代幣。
welcomeDescTwo.description: Entry text for welcome screen in the panel, new user

welcomeFooterTextOne.description: Link in the footer (takes you to rewards settings page) for welcome screen in the panel, existing user

welcomeFooterTextTwo.description: Link in the footer (takes you to rewards settings page) for welcome screen in the panel, new user

welcomeHeaderOne.message: 我們對 Brave 支付進行了一次大升級。
welcomeHeaderOne.description: Main header title for welcome screen in the panel, existing user

welcomeHeaderTwo.message: 準備好體驗網路的未來。
welcomeHeaderTwo.description: Main header title for welcome screen in the panel, new user

yourWallet.description: Title of wallet section where we display data about wallet

grants.description: Title for grant section in wallet summary

on.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

verifiedPublisher.description: Tells user that this particular publisher is verified publisher

rewardsContributeAttentionScore.description: Label for auto contribute table attention for the publisher

donateMonthly.description: Label for drop down menu where user select amount for monthly contribution for particular publisher

includeInAuto.description: Label for checkbox that allows user to exclude publishers from auto contribute

donateNow.description: CTA for sending tip form site banner

enableTips.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

for.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

rewardsSummary.description: Section title in wallet panel, which contains monthly rewards summary

tokenGrant.description: Title for grant section in wallet summary

earningsAds.description: Title for ads section in wallet summary

rewardsContribute.description: Title for auto contribute section in wallet summary

oneTimeDonation.description: Title for one time tips section in wallet summary

expiresOn.description: Used for grant representation. Whole string is '30.0 BAT expires on 08/05/2022'

recurringDonations.description: Title for monthly tips section in wallet summary

off.description: Label used in toggle indicating that toggle is off

ok.description: Used in notification to dismiss notification

braveAdsTitle.description: Notification title when we display info about ads

braveContributeTitle.description: Notification title when we display info about auto contribution

contributeNotificationSuccess.description: We show this string in the notification when contribution is successful

grantNotification.message: 您有一筆資助正在等您。

braveRewardsCreatingText.description: Used in a button displaying wallet creation process

contributeNotificationError.message: There was a problem processing your contribution.
contributeNotificationError.description: We show this string in notification when contribution fails

contributeNotificationNotEnoughFunds.message: Your scheduled monthly payment for Auto-Contribute and monthly tips could not be completed due to insufficient funds. We’ll try again in 30 days.
contributeNotificationNotEnoughFunds.description: We show this string in the notification when you don't have enough funds for contribution

contributeNotificationTipError.message: There was a problem processing your tip, please try again.
contributeNotificationTipError.description: We show this string in notification when tip fails
